SECTION_CONTENT:
POCH product packaging must be disposed of in compliance with the country-specific regulations or must be passed to a packaging
return system. Handle contaminated packing in the same way as the substrate itself. Always contact a permitted waste disposal to
assure compliance with all current local, state and federal regulations.
